text:
Hi Annie, that's interesting. Could you please share the code that you are using for the inputs? Including the strings that you are using as labels :thinking:

also, does it happen during local dev or in prod? or both?

Hello!

We have a HubSpot ui extension app and wanted to check if anybody has any unit tests for the app?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C05R599UA12/p1700041446710329|The last conversation around that happened in 2023> and not sure if something changed over that period that i've possibly missed.

Are there any other approaches devs are using to test their apps?
